The editor doesn't come up and I can't regenerate my model.


Note that I was able to work around this by reverting Eclipse back to using 
the standard UI.

Note that even when using the standard UI there is a problem.  It isn't 
possible to reload a genmodel anymore.  I get the following stack trace in my 
log file:
